hiveArticle.title: Bitcoin and Anarchy in Mexico - Jeff Berwick on The Keiser Report
hiveArticle.body:
https://dollarvigilante.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/bitcoinandanarchyinmexico.jpg
I was recently in Mexico City with Max Keiser of The Keiser Report on RT talking about a wide range of topics including bitcoin, anarchy and how they may end up being the two things which help the world retake the freedoms taken from them by central banks and government. We spoke about how bitcoin came about in 2009 right at the peak of the last financial crisis as almost a gift from God. I talked about how well the Mexican economy is doing compared to the US’ in addition to how difficult it is to do business in the US because of the massive number of regulations and taxation. I said one of the reasons why I personally love Mexico is that the population is generally anti-government. We also talked about things like the differences between the Mexican and US economies and how there are quite a few Americans coming to Mexico in search of greener pastures as well as how America has really turned into a massive nanny state. Plus, we highlight just how awful and expensive the medical care systems are in the US and Canada and how not only is the quality of care better in Mexico, but it’s on demand and cheaper. Check out the full interview below to learn more about what it’s like to live a little bit freer on the other side of the imaginary line. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xt6vyB3ttE4 If you want to learn more about cryptocurrencies check out my free four video webinar HERE. And make sure to subscribe to our Youtube channel so you don’t miss any future videos. And, of course, follow us here on Steemit where The Dollar Vigilante content is always posted first! We are closing in on 10,000 followers on Steemit! Thank you!
